channel.title: About on Kennedy Casey
channel.description: Recent content in About on Kennedy Casey

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Lab Manager, Chatter Lab Department of Comparative Human Development, University of Chicago I currently work with Dr. Marisa Casillas at the University of Chicago as the manager for the Chatter Lab. Previously, I completed my BA in Psychology at Princeton University, where I worked with Dr. Casey Lew-Williams as a thesis student in the Princeton Baby Lab. My research focuses on how young children build context-rich word representations from their everyday language input.

item.title: Papers

(2023). Attrition rate in infant fNIRS research: A meta-analysis. Infancy, XX. pdf doi data Casey, K., Novick, K., & Lourenco, S.
